text: Harm Ottenbros (27 June 1943 â€“ 4 May 2022) was a Dutch road bicycle racer. He raced as a professional from 1967 to 1976. He won a gold medal and rainbow jersey at the 1969 world cycling championship road race in Zolder, Belgium.1969 Road Race World Championship results He was born in Alkmaar. Ottenbros died in Strijen at the age of 78.Oud-wereldkampioen wielrennen Harm Ottenbros (78) overleden ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Alkmaar
title: Harm Ottenbros
